title: error_reporting

title: error_reporting
text: language Google implemented functionality capture stacktrace use basis report. using R code need create erorr message, note can still include dynamic content. instance, can setup tryCatch() call output e (error) Error Reporting call. note leave following items following reasons - “eventTime”: string, – formated Zulu, possible, much easier just rely event time. want include time note need use Zulu format requried Google. example “@type”: string - Optional. information field, see Specify @type.
code: message = "Error description",           # service           service = "My Service",           version = "0.0.1",           # context           method = "GET",           url = "https://example.com",           userAgent = "",           referrer = "",           responseStatusCode = "500",           remoteIp = "192.178.0.0.1",           user = "UserID",           #reportLocation           filepath message$eventTime <- format(lubridate::now(), "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")

what: This packages allows you to send error reports to Google Error Reporting service
title: This packages allows you to send error reports to Google Error Reporting service
text: R wrapper Google Cloud Platform Error Reporting API. uses Error Reporting API defined projects.events.report method. Using Google OAuth 2.0 authentication wishlisht. current version authenticates using API key can call like: work consistently.

title: This packages allows you to send error reports to Google Error Reporting service
text: can install development version googleErrorReportingR GitHub :

title: This packages allows you to send error reports to Google Error Reporting service
text: basic example shows solve common problem: Note fully formated JSON even message using list can now send report Google project.
code: library(googleErrorReportingR)  api_key <- Sys.getenv("API_KEY")  message <- format_error_message() toJSON(message, auto_unbox = TRUE, pretty = TRUE ) #> { #>   "message": "Error description", #>   "serviceContext": { #>     "service": "My Service", #>     "version": "0.0.1" #>   }, #>   "context": { #>     "httpRequest": { #>       "method": "GET", #>       "url": "https://example.com", #>       "userAgent": "", #>       "referrer": "", #>       "responseStatusCode": "500", #>       "remoteIp": "192.178.0.0.1" #>     }, #>     "user": "UserID", #>     "reportLocation": { #>       "filePath": "/", #>       "lineNumber": 0, #>       "functionName": "my_function" #>     } #>   } #> } project_id <- "infraestructura-pruebas"  googleErrorReportingR::report_error(project_id,                                     api_key,                                     message) #> Response [https://clouderrorreporting.googleapis.com/v1beta1/projects/infraestructura-pruebas/events:report?key=AIzaSyAeZ8s971ICl567niaSxvTitfQL4pijoJA] #>   Date: 2022-06-18 17:58 #>   Status: 200 #>   Content-Type: application/json; charset=UTF-8 #>   Size: 3 B #> {}
